data.text: Guye loo ɠundiɠii nɔnɔi ʋe. É loozu ga kɔnigiti. Davide ná-guyei.
Ee, GALA, woilo nà-kpee wooi ma,
Eteai ɠwɛmaʋɛ ɠa gè wooɠulazu ná è ma, zìiɓɔlɔʋɛ.
Nà pɔ gè zei ɗa-zeɠe ʋɛlɛi wu, gè yɛ ná ɠɔ,
Mazɔlɔɔ GALA, ɗa ɠa è woilosu nà-minazeɠe gooiti ma,
Gá-masagi zii ma voloiti suɠooza, è ta ɓɔ ti ʋa,
É yɛ zeini GALA kakala, eyɛsu ɠɔ.
Ungo, nà guyei loozu yeenɔpɛ è-laaseigi lɛbi vai zu,
